sentences.english: Is it because I have some desires yet to realize?
sentences.chinese: 是因为我还有未了的心愿吗？

sentences.english: At this moment, an idea came into Tucheng ' s mind, which was to make artificial cultivated land.
sentences.chinese: 此时的土成有一个心愿，他萌生了人造耕地的想法。

sentences.english: Three is afraid of in some way yet but would have died, free grudge.
sentences.chinese: 三是怕某些心愿尚未了却便就此撒手西去，空余遗恨。

sentences.english: If couldn t hand in the finished product, he wishes will be dashed.
sentences.chinese: 届时若交不出成品，兰博士的心愿就要落空了。

sentences.english: The public can only use the photograph into the electronic album you wish.
sentences.chinese: 大众只能用照片做成的电子像册聊表心愿。

sentences.english: Speaking of his wish when Zhang Hao eyes the tears poured out.
sentences.chinese: 说到自己的心愿时，张浩眼里涌出了泪水。

sentences.english: I am ready to do all you desire in the matter of cedar and cypress timber.
sentences.chinese: 你也要成全我的心愿，将食物给我的家。

sentences.english: Full of hope, stand on tiptoe, twinkle star be able to touch.
sentences.chinese: 满满的心愿，踮起脚，闪烁的许愿星就能触到。

sentences.english: And you shall meet my wishes by providing food for my household.
sentences.chinese: 你也要成全我的心愿，将食物给我的家。

sentences.english: Liu Chi has realized his little dream.
sentences.chinese: 刘驰实现了自己的小小心愿。

sentences.english: "Turning to Kimigayo, Cheng Yuet Kimigayo" is our wish.
sentences.chinese: “迎君之来成君之悦”是我们的心愿。

sentences.english: And you do not wish me to go away without fulfilling your original intentions?
sentences.chinese: 您愿不愿意我在还没了却您原先的心愿以前就离开？

sentences.english: The items on your list can be as big or as little as you want.
sentences.chinese: 你所列举的条目随你心愿可大可小。

sentences.english: Our unfulfilled desires lead to fighting and quarreling.
sentences.chinese: 我们未成的心愿导致争吵。

sentences.english: Clients' satisfaction is the company's great wishes .
sentences.chinese: 使用户满意是创华的最大心愿。

sentences.english: Soon his dedication will be complete.
sentences.chinese: 叶琛的心愿很快就将实现了。

definition: hope and expectation/to anticipate/to look forward to/to await expectantly
to make a wish/to make a vow/to promise a reward
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
to pray/to pray for sth/to wish sth/prayer/wish
